long_description: This Dry Ride seat cover helps keep your bicycle seat covered and protected from the elements when you're not riding. Made of durable urethane-coated ripstop nylon that offers protection from rain, sleet or snow. Ideal for anyone storing their bike outside or transporting a bike on their vehicle. Fits most saddles, though may not work with wider, comfort-minded saddles with springs.
short_description: This Dry Ride seat cover helps keep your bicycle seat covered and protected from the elements when you're not riding.
